stepTitle: Suppose you drop a rock into a dark well and, using precision equipment, you measure the time for the sound of a splash to return. (a) Neglecting the time required for sound to travel up the well, calculate the distance to the water if the sound returns in $$2.0000$$ s. The speed of sound is $$332.00$$ $$\frac{m}{s}$$ in this well.
